context_messages.content:
In this task, you are given a text of news article and corresponding headline of an article. Your task is to give label "match" if headline is correct for article, otherwise give label "no".

Example Input: Article: There is no official word from the White House that President Obama will actually stop in Rochester, but with scheduled appearances in Buffalo and Syracuse he will have to pass through or nearby. Headline: State Sen. Stewart Greenleaf discusses proposed human trafficking bill
Example Output: no

Example Input: Article: The winter weather has created an urgent need for blood donors across most of the United States. Headline: Weather creating urgent need for blood
Example Output: match

Example Input: Article: The Big Ten finally revealed its new logo and division names today and missed badly on both. Headline: Big Ten reveals logo, division names
Example Output:
